message.text: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

steps.name: Setup PHP with extensions and custom config
steps.run: node dist/index.js

steps.name: Testing PHP version
steps.run:
php -v
php -r "if(strpos(phpversion(), '${{ matrix.php-versions }}') === false) {throw new Exception('Wrong PHP version Installed');}"

steps.name: Testing Composer version
steps.run:
composer -V
php -r "if(strpos(@exec('composer -V'), 'Composer version') === false) {throw new Exception('Composer not found');}"

steps.name: Testing Extensions
steps.run:
php -m
php -r "if(! extension_loaded('xml')) {throw new Exception('xml not found');}"
php -r "if(! extension_loaded('Xdebug')) {throw new Exception('Xdebug not found');}"
php -r "if(phpversion()>=7.1 && ! extension_loaded('pcov')) {throw new Exception('PCOV not found');}"

steps.name: Testing ini values
steps.run:
php -r "if(ini_get('memory_limit')!='-1') {throw new Exception('memory_limit not disabled');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('post_max_size')!='256M') {throw new Exception('post_max_size not added');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('short_open_tag')!=1) {throw new Exception('short_open_tag not added');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('date.timezone')!='Asia/Kolkata') {throw new Exception('date.timezone not added');}"

steps.name: Stage php-version-file
steps.run: echo ${{ env.default-php-version }} > php-version-file

steps.name: Setup PHP with extensions and custom config
steps.run: node dist/index.js

steps.name: Testing PHP version
steps.run:
php -v
php -r "if(strpos(phpversion(), '${{ matrix.php-versions || env.default-php-version }}') === false) {throw new Exception('Wrong PHP version Installed');}"

steps.name: Testing Composer version
steps.run:
composer -V
php -r "if(strpos(@exec('composer -V'), 'Composer version') === false) {throw new Exception('Composer not found');}"

steps.name: Testing Extensions
steps.run:
php -m
php -r "if(! extension_loaded('gd')) {throw new Exception('gd not found');}"
php -r "if(! extension_loaded('xml')) {throw new Exception('xml not found');}"
php -r "if(! extension_loaded('Xdebug')) {throw new Exception('Xdebug not found');}"
php -r "if(phpversion()>=7.1 && ! extension_loaded('pcov')) {throw new Exception('PCOV not found');}"

steps.name: Testing ini values
steps.run:
php -r "if(ini_get('memory_limit')!='-1') {throw new Exception('memory_limit not disabled');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('post_max_size')!='256M') {throw new Exception('post_max_size not added');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('short_open_tag')!=1) {throw new Exception('short_open_tag not added');}"
php -r "if(ini_get('date.timezone')!='Asia/Kolkata') {throw new Exception('date.timezone not added');}"
